overview_summary: The neighboring landowners are a mix of small private LLCs, a national real estate investor, and a government entity. Several appear to be holding land passively (for example, no active business or public profile) ([search.sunbiz.org](https://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/SearchResults?ListNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&inquiryDirectionType=CurrentList&inquiryType=EntityName&searchNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&searchTerm=Jolito%2C+Inc.#:~:text=and%20Trademarks%20by%20Name%20search,INACT%2FUA%20JOLI)) ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/tonawanda/67#:~:text=No%20,transport%20realty)), while one (EZ Industries LLC) is an operating local auto service business ([www.mapquest.com](https://www.mapquest.com/us/new-york/eric-one-stop-416874668#:~:text=EZ%20Tire%20Auto%20in%20North,great%20at%20an%20affordable%20rate)). One adjacent parcel is owned by Erie County itself, indicating a public stake (possibly for infrastructure or brownfield purposes) ([www3.erie.gov](https://www3.erie.gov/environment/land-development-economic-development-planning-studies#:~:text=Planning%20www3,Lee%20Design%20Professionals%20as%20the)). No clear evidence of organized opposition was found among these owners; their motivations likely range from profit and property value to public-interest considerations, posing varying levels of risk or opportunity for a new development.

neighbors.name: Transport Realty Co
neighbors.claims: Transport Realty Co appears to be an older corporate landowner in Tonawanda with minimal public information available ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/tonawanda/67#:~:text=No%20,transport%20realty)). The name suggests ties to the transportation or logistics sector, but no active business operations or local presence can be identified in public directories or records ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/tonawanda/67#:~:text=No%20,transport%20realty)). There are no media reports, filings, or community activities linked to this entity, implying it functions purely as a passive property holder (beneficial owners are not publicly listed) ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/tonawanda/67#:~:text=No%20,transport%20realty)). Its stance on development is unknown, as it has made no public statements or legal filings regarding area projects as of this date.
neighbors.influence_justification: No public profile or known local involvement; holds a single parcel with no major economic footprint

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify the owner or registered agent through property records and extend a direct purchase or partnership offer; emphasize financial benefits since the entity likely cares only about property value. Prepare for a passive negotiation – they have not engaged publicly, so a straightforward above-market offer or favorable lease terms may be the most effective way to secure their cooperation.

neighbors.name: EZ Industries LLC
neighbors.claims: EZ Industries LLC is a New York limited liability company formed on May 21, 2015 (DOS ID 4762461) ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/north-tonawanda/ez-industries-llc#:~:text=Governing%20Agency%20%20,5%2F31%2F2025)). Its mailing address is 107 River Road, North Tonawanda ([www.bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/ny/north-tonawanda/ez-industries-llc#:~:text=The%20mailing%20address%20of%20the,the%20company%27s%20activities%20and%20communications)), which corresponds to “EZ Tire & Auto,” a local automotive repair and inspection business ([www.mapquest.com](https://www.mapquest.com/us/new-york/eric-one-stop-416874668#:~:text=EZ%20Tire%20Auto%20in%20North,great%20at%20an%20affordable%20rate)). The company owns three adjacent parcels in Tonawanda, indicating it may use or plan to use the land for its auto-related operations or as an investment in industrial property ([www.mapquest.com](https://www.mapquest.com/us/new-york/eric-one-stop-416874668#:~:text=EZ%20Tire%20Auto%20in%20North,great%20at%20an%20affordable%20rate)). EZ Industries and its principals do not feature in local political or media reports, suggesting their interest in development is limited to how it affects their business (e.g., traffic or access) rather than any broader agenda ([www.mapquest.com](https://www.mapquest.com/us/new-york/eric-one-stop-416874668#:~:text=EZ%20Tire%20Auto%20in%20North,great%20at%20an%20affordable%20rate)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small local business with limited land (auto repair shop); no evident political connections or major economic sway

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the owner (or manager) of EZ Tire & Auto personally to understand their concerns. Emphasize how the development can coexist with or even benefit their business (e.g., improved road infrastructure or increased customer base). Address practical issues like construction timing, traffic, or visibility. Gaining their support may simply require assurances that their daily operations won’t be hindered and potentially offering minor concessions (such as signage, shared parking arrangements, or service contracts) as goodwill.

neighbors.name: Jollip LLC
neighbors.claims: Jollip LLC’s ownership and purpose are not publicly documented. Searches of New York business registries and news archives reveal no information about this entity, suggesting it is a shell company or passive land holding with no active operations ([search.sunbiz.org](https://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/SearchResults?ListNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&inquiryDirectionType=CurrentList&inquiryType=EntityName&searchNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&searchTerm=Jolito%2C+Inc.#:~:text=and%20Trademarks%20by%20Name%20search,INACT%2FUA%20JOLI)). The company’s only known asset is the parcel of land (PIN 65.09-6-3) in Tonawanda, and there are no records of any development activity, permit applications, or community engagement by this LLC. Its beneficial owners remain unknown, and no stance on local development has been expressed in any public forum as of now ([search.sunbiz.org](https://search.sunbiz.org/Inquiry/CorporationSearch/SearchResults?ListNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&inquiryDirectionType=CurrentList&inquiryType=EntityName&searchNameOrder=JOLIOLI+L190002155700&searchTerm=Jolito%2C+Inc.#:~:text=and%20Trademarks%20by%20Name%20search,INACT%2FUA%20JOLI)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Opaque ownership with no public presence; likely a passive land investor with a single parcel

approach_recommendations.engage: Investigate property deeds or county records to identify the individual behind Jollip LLC, as personal outreach will be necessary. Since the entity itself is dormant publicly, the owner’s goal is likely maximizing land sale value. Approach with a strong financial offer or partnership proposition that highlights a win-win (they profit without having to develop themselves). Be prepared for a purely profit-driven discussion – if the owner is holding the land for speculation, demonstrating that your project increases its value or offering to buy them out at a premium should gain their cooperation.

neighbors.name: County Of Erie
neighbors.claims: Erie County (population roughly 950,000) is the local government encompassing Tonawanda ([datausa.io](https://datausa.io/profile/geo/erie-county-ny?redirect=true#:~:text=Erie%20County%2C%20NY%20,increase%202023%20Poverty%20Rate%2014)). The county owns parcel 65.10-1-5, likely for public purposes such as infrastructure, environmental management, or future development planning rather than private commercial interest ([www3.erie.gov](https://www3.erie.gov/environment/land-development-economic-development-planning-studies#:~:text=Planning%20www3,Lee%20Design%20Professionals%20as%20the)). As a municipal entity, Erie County’s stance on any project will align with broader public policy goals – for example, job creation, tax base expansion, environmental compliance, and community welfare. The county has significant influence through zoning, permitting, and potential funding or incentives (e.g., via the Erie County Industrial Development Agency) and can be a powerful ally if the project aligns with its economic development priorities ([www3.erie.gov](https://www3.erie.gov/environment/land-development-economic-development-planning-studies#:~:text=Planning%20www3,Lee%20Design%20Professionals%20as%20the)). There is no indication of opposition; instead, the county typically supports developments that meet regulatory requirements and deliver public benefits.
neighbors.influence_justification: County government with regulatory authority and resources; can shape zoning and provide incentives or obstacles as it sees fit

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Erie County officials and planners early to ensure the project aligns with county development objectives (such as brownfield reuse or infrastructure improvement). Emphasize public benefits: job creation, increased tax revenue, sustainable land use – outcomes the county is mandated to support. Work with the county’s economic development agencies (like ECIDA) to possibly obtain incentives, which also secures their buy-in. Since the county’s interest is serving constituents, maintaining transparency and highlighting how the project addresses community needs will convert the county from a neutral landowner into an active project partner.

neighbors.name: R L R Investments LLC
neighbors.claims: R.L.R. Investments LLC is a large, multi-state property investment firm with roots in the freight transportation industry ([rlrllc.com](https://rlrllc.com/#:~:text=Since%20we%20started%20with%20a,trusted%20and%20respected%20property%20investor)). The company operates a nationwide real estate portfolio (industrial, commercial, land) across many states, including New York ([rlrllc.com](https://rlrllc.com/#:~:text=Delaware%20Florida%20Georgia%20Hawaii%20Iowa,Washington%20Wisconsin%20West%20Virginia%20Wyoming)). “RLR” corresponds to R. L. Roberts – as evidenced by related entities like R.L. Roberts LLC being associated with it ([dockets.justia.com](https://dockets.justia.com/docket/new-york/nyedce/1%3A2020cv01606/446816#:~:text=RLR%20Investments%2C%20LLC%20et%20al,U.S.%20District)) – which ties back to the family behind R+L Carriers, a major logistics company. This suggests that RLR Investments acquires strategic properties for logistics or investment purposes and has considerable financial resources and professional legal counsel at its disposal ([rlrllc.com](https://rlrllc.com/#:~:text=Since%20we%20started%20with%20a,trusted%20and%20respected%20property%20investor)). However, being an external investor, it has no known local community role or political ties in Tonawanda. Its interest in development is likely purely ROI-driven, and it will assess any project in terms of property value impact or opportunity for its own development plans.
neighbors.influence_justification: Significant financial capacity and real estate expertise, but as an outside entity it has limited local social or political leverage

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact RLR’s real estate asset manager or acquisitions department (the decision-makers for their property holdings) with a proposal that highlights mutual benefit. Given their freight investment background, frame the project in terms of enhancing land value or creating infrastructure that could benefit logistics use. If the project potentially conflicts with their plans, consider offering to purchase their parcel at a premium or involve them as a partner (e.g., a leaseback or joint venture) so they see financial upside. Anticipate a formal, profitability-focused negotiation – RLR will respond to clear business cases and may bring in attorneys or consultants, so ensure all dealings are professional and backed by solid numbers.
